data.heading: About Us
data.blurb: Discover beautifully designed components that you can copy and paste into your apps. Free. Open Source.

sections.title: About Teaser
sections.description: A teaser section that leads to the about page.

data.heading: Why Choose Us?
data.blurb: Build your next project faster with beautifully crafted components that are accessible, customizable, and open source.

sections.name: aboutContent
sections.title: About Content
sections.description: Main content section with mission and features.

data.heading: Our Mission
data.mission: Our business is on the belief that beautiful, accessible, and performant web applications should be easy to create. We provide a collection of reusable components that you can copy and paste into your apps.

features.title: Zero-Install Components
features.description: Simply copy and paste beautifully designed components directly into your project. No package installation or complex setup required.

features.title: Accessibility First
features.description: Every component follows WAI-ARIA guidelines and includes keyboard navigation, focus management, and proper ARIA attributes.

features.title: Infinite Customization
features.description: Built on Radix UI primitives and styled with Tailwind CSS, allowing for complete control over styling and behavior.

features.title: Dark Mode Ready
features.description: Seamlessly switch between light and dark themes with our pre-configured color schemes and CSS variables.

features.title: TypeScript Powered
features.description: Fully typed components for better developer experience and catch errors before they reach production.

features.title: Open Source Freedom
features.description: MIT licensed and free to use in personal and commercial projects, with an active community of contributors.

profiles.title: Senior Developer
profiles.excerpt: Experienced full-stack developer with a passion for UI/UX
